about_the_game:
Take charge of unique sea ports around the world to efficiently control the flow of containers and make deliveries to waiting vehicles. You'll earn money each wave to upgrade your port so it can handle the next wave of incoming shipments. Do a good job and you'll unlock more ports with their own unique set of ridiculous challenges and equipment. How many plates can you keep spinning at once?

Container defense stack-em-up

Key features in the demo

  • Get into the flow as you deliver containers to waiting vehicles with perfect timing

  • Grow your port by buying and upgrading buildings and equipment

  • Each port is unique and inspired by actual ports around the world

  • Incoming waves of containers change each time you play

  • Sink incoming boats on your command with a shark-filled aquarium

Features in the full game

  • Trains and airports

  • Specialty containers like a shipment of Velociraptors that require, uh, special handling

  • Pirates, UFOs, Portals, and more ridiculous ways to ship waaaayy more containers

  • More ports with unique and ridiculous buildings

  • Endless and Cozy game modes

  • Compete against other players and your friends in the leaderboards

  • Play in your language

short_description: Ridiculous Shipping is a strategy simulation game about running a chaotic sea port. Take charge of unique ports around the world, unload ships, and get every container to its destination using cranes, drones, trucks, and ridiculous buildings like shark-filled aquariums.
